item.description: Speech technology and Argentinean Welsh code{white-space: pre-wrap;} span.smallcaps{font-variant: small-caps;} span.underline{text-decoration: underline;} div.column{display: inline-block; vertical-align: top; width: 50%;} of {$slidecount} 1 « ‹ › » {$slidecount} A+ A- ½ {$title}, {$author} Speech technology and Argentinean Welsh Elise Bell The University of Texas at El Paso eabell2@utep.edu 19 August, 2019 IntroductionSpeech language technology Requirements Spoken and/or written data sets Sufficient data to make generalizations
